version_description:
We have massively improved our voice recognition technology to make pronunciation exercises more accurate and reliable. It now works whatever your accent! We're also adding pronunciation exercises in new course languages (French, German and more) so keep an eye out for them! 
As always – if you enjoy busuu, please leave us a nice review.

We have massively improved our voice recognition technology to make pronunciation exercises more accurate and reliable. It now works whatever your accent! We're also adding pronunciation exercises in new course languages (French, German and more) so keep an eye out for them! 
As always – if you enjoy busuu, please leave us a nice review.

We have massively improved our voice recognition technology to make pronunciation exercises more accurate and reliable. It now works whatever your accent! We're also adding pronunciation exercises in new course languages (French, German and more) so keep an eye out for them! 
As always – if you enjoy busuu, please leave us a nice review.

We all love connecting with other language learners and practicing with them. That’s what makes busuu so special! After all the improvements we’ve recently released to our community features (new cards layout, replies and Best Correction), it was time to finally launch what many of you have asked...Friends!

You can now friend other busuu learners you’ve interacted with, keep in touch with them and learn together. Send your Writing exercises to your friends for correction or have a look in the “Friends” feed in Help Others to see what the Writing exercises they have submitted. Get and give back!

You can now add other busuu learners as friends from their profile, by tapping on “Add friend”.

Once your request is accepted, you can see your friends’ writing exercises in the “Friends” tab and send correction requests.

After you’ve submitted a Writing exercise, you can choose up to 5 friends to send it to and they will be notified.

You can also see the Writing exercises they have submitted in the “Friends” feed in Help Others so you’re always able to help them.

Finally, we’ve added a Notification Center so you can keep track of all your interactions with our wonderful community.

Learning a language is all about speaking it, right?

Guess what? You can finally improve both your written and spoken conversational skills with native speakers from all over the world

Because we believe language is about conversation, busuu is the first language learning app in the world to offer spoken conversations with native speakers.

With this new exercise type, we’ve added voice to our tremendously popular writing exercises, now renamed “Conversations”.

Members of our wonderful community will then give you feedback on your exercise by talking or writing back. You can have whole conversations within threads of written and spoken replies.

We can't wait to hear you speak!

Our busuu update is here to make your language learning experience even better. To celebrate our fantastic community support, we want to give back to our users.

*For a limited time we’re giving you 50% OFF our Premium 12 month plan!*

Want to challenge yourself? We’ve introduced an estimated unit timer allowing you to see how long each unit takes to complete.

At busuu, we’re a community and we’re constantly looking to make it more welcoming and inclusive. This is why we’ve introduced the ability to flag exercises and corrections to remove any offensive content.

We’re always working to make sure our app is at the top of its game. If you love the busuu app, please leave us a review on the App Store.
If you’ve got any feedback or comments, please leave us a message at team@busuu.com

Have you learned English in the past? Not sure how much you remember? Wondering where to start again?

busuu can now assess your knowledge of the language and place you in the right part of the course.

At the moment, the Placement Test is only available to users learning English; however, it will soon be available for other languages!

We’re always working to make sure our app is at the top of its game. If you love the busuu app, please leave us a review on the App Store.

If you’ve got any feedback or comments, please leave us a message at team@busuu.com.

It’s finally here — a new look for busuu!
Over the past month, we’ve been working on something very special: an all-new look for our courses! We’ve listened to your suggestions, added some cool ideas of our own and poured it all into what could be the biggest update in busuu history.

Why did we do it?
We wanted to make your learning experience even better by improving one of the core parts of our app: the "Learn" tab. We’ve now given you the ability to jump straight into where you left off by pressing on the “Next up” button. It’s now even easier to track your progress by being able to clearly see your overall progress through each lesson. And we’ve polished it all off with stunning imagery and some rather fancy animations.

Making a few language mistakes while learning on busuu? Getting some grammar confused? Forgot what a word means? Don’t worry - it’s completely natural. After all, if you don’t make mistakes then you’re not learning. We’ve now made it easier to focus on your weaker areas - you no longer need to repeat an entire activity just to correct a few mistakes. Instead you’ll find those exercises repeat themselves so you get another try. This way, you’ll benefit from your mistakes! Practice makes perfect!

"Our NEW Business English course. A good level of English could secure you a better job! Boost your employability with our amazing new workplace course.

Talk with ease on the phone and in meetings, communicate effectively in everyday office scenarios and impress your boss with your knowledge of computer and digital terminology."

"Our NEW Business English course. A good level of English could secure you a better job! Boost your employability with our amazing new workplace course.

Talk with ease on the phone and in meetings, communicate effectively in everyday office scenarios and impress your boss with your knowledge of computer and digital terminology."

Everyone loves a graph, right? With our new progress dashboard, you get fantastic insights into your learning journey. Find out your fluency score, see your vocabulary grow over time and keep track of your progress.

No time to learn a language? Juggling work, studies, gym, family, friends and other hobbies?
Take the stress out of learning languages with a personalised and adaptive Study Plan that fits around your life.
Set your goals and your schedule
Generate a plan based on your availability
Work towards an estimated completion date, in small, achievable steps
Learning a language has never been simpler.

Learning a language has never been simpler.

No time to learn a language? Juggling work, studies, gym, family, friends and other hobbies?
Take the stress out of learning languages with a personalised and adaptive Study Plan that fits around your life.
Set your goals and your schedule
Generate a plan based on your availability
Work towards an estimated completion date, in small, achievable steps
Learning a language has never been simpler.
